persona_lines: i live to not disappoint my loved ones.

conversation_contexts: I keep hearing noises outside my window. It sounds like scratching.

turns.text: I keep hearing noises out my window and I'm home alone. It's very concerning.
Should you call the police or something?  I hate being home alone for this exact reason.
I believe in the right to bare arms. So I need to go see whats happening.
Just be careful and turn lights on so you don't shoot someone you know or an animal.
Always. I'd want to more scare an intruder then actually having to use it.
I'm the same.  I have a firearm as well.  don't want to ever use it but if I have to protect my son and I, I will.
And that is away it should be. It is all about protecting you & your family from possible threats.
It sure it.  A good security system and cameras are very comforting as well.
My husband wants to get those since I am usually home alone at night and we live out in the middle of no-where.
I think that's a great idea.
I believe so to-Just looking for a good deal on those.
Get a couple of quotes.  Someone somewhere is always running a deal.
Oh we are planning on just buying a system and us install them ourself.
Nice to be so handy.  I couldn't do that at all.  I'd need someone to do it for me
It's really very simple. You can find a lot of how-to videos on Youtube. You just buy your system search by the model number.
That's exactly what we did when we installed our. We found an installation guide online and followed it.
